conversation.message:
Dear Student_E,

Thank you for your thoughtful note and for your continued interest in School_C.

At a high level: we are still treating our remaining seat as reserved for higher-priority candidates on our admissions order, and we have not yet reached a point where we are ready to release that hold. Because of that, we can’t give a definitive timeline or guarantee about when (or whether) we would move to the next candidate.

What would change our position is if it becomes clear that the higher-priority candidates will not be pursuing School_C (for example, they finalize elsewhere or explicitly indicate they are no longer considering us). If/when that happens, we would immediately move to the next student on our priority list who is actively seeking the seat.

We genuinely appreciate your readiness to commit. For your planning purposes, we encourage you to continue engaging with your other options as well, and if anything changes on our end we will act as quickly as possible.

Sincerely,
School_C Admissions
